paper_abstract: TARGETED DEPLOYMENT OF HARDWARE ACCELERATORS CAN IMPROVE THROUGHPUT AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY IN LARGE-SCALE DATA PROCESSING. DATA PARTITIONING IS CRITICAL FOR MANIPULATING LARGE DATASETS AND IS OFTEN THE LIMITING FACTOR IN DATABASE PERFORMANCE. A HARDWARE ACCELERATOR FOR RANGE PARTITIONING AND A HARDWARE-SOFTWARE STREAMING FRAMEWORK PROVIDE AN ORDER OF MAGNITUDE IMPROVEMENT IN PARTITIONING ENERGY AND PERFORMANCE.
paper_title: HARDWARE PARTITIONING FOR BIG DATA ANALYTICS
